header.title: Internal Mechanism
header.description: Deep dive into the JavaScript Runtime, Execution Context, and Memory Model.

eventLoop.title: Event Loop Visualizer
eventLoop.description: Step through the Event Loop to understand how JavaScript handles async code.

keyRule.title: Key Rule
keyRule.content: Microtasks (Promises, queueMicrotask) are processed immediately after the current script and before any new Macrotask (setTimeout, I/O).

thisBinding.title: 5 Rules of 'this'
thisBinding.description: Explore how 'this' binding works in different contexts.

scopeClosure.title: Closures
scopeClosure.description: Create multiple counters to see how closures maintain independent state.

async.title: Promise Visualizer
async.description: Interactively explore how different Promise combinators handle multiple asynchronous tasks.

promiseAll.title: Promise.all
promiseAll.description: Wait for all to fulfill. Rejects immediately if any rejects.

promiseAllSettled.title: Promise.allSettled
promiseAllSettled.description: Wait for all to finish, regardless of status. Never rejects.

promiseRace.title: Promise.race
promiseRace.description: First settled promise (resolve OR reject) determines the result.

promiseAny.title: Promise.any
promiseAny.description: Wait for first fulfilled. Rejects only if ALL reject.

withResolvers.title: Promise.withResolvers (ES2024)
withResolvers.description: Returns an object with a new Promise and its resolve/reject functions. Useful for creating promises that are resolved externally.

abortController.title: AbortController (Cancel Async Tasks)
abortController.description: Fetch requests (and other async tasks) can be cancelled using AbortController.

advancedDataStructure.title: Advanced Data Structures
advancedDataStructure.description: Map, Set, WeakMap, WeakSet, and WeakRef.

map.title: Map vs Object
map.key1: Keys can be any type (objects, functions, primitives).

set.title: Set (Unique Collection)
set.description: Stores unique values of any type. Useful for removing duplicates.

weak.title: Weak References (GC Friendly)
weak.description1: WeakMap/WeakSet: Keys must be objects. They are held "weakly", meaning if there are no other references to the object, it can be garbage collected. Not iterable.
weak.description2: WeakRef (ES2021): advanced feature to hold a weak reference to an object.

optimization.title: V8 Hidden Classes
optimization.description: Visualize how V8 optimizes objects with consistent shapes.

keyTakeaway.title: Key Takeaway
keyTakeaway.content: Always initialize properties in the exact same order to help V8 share hidden classes and optimize property access (Monomorphism).

dsl.title: Domain-Specific Language
dsl.description: Mini-languages tailored for specific problem domains.

whatIsDsl.title: What is a DSL?
whatIsDsl.description: Unlike General Purpose Languages (GPL) like Java or Python, DSLs are focused on specific tasks.
whatIsDsl.internal: Internal DSL: Using host language features (e.g., jQuery, React JSX, builder patterns).
whatIsDsl.external: External DSL: Separate syntax/parser (e.g., SQL, CSS, Regex, Markdown).
